1.0.0.en: Add support for OSO inCharge water heaters

1.0.1.en: Changed description in app store for NO

1.0.2.en: Added separate temperature sensors for the water heaters.

1.0.3.en: Add flow to turn on/off sleep mode and high demand

1.0.4.en: Added triggers for low and top temperature changes.

1.0.5.en: Added onoff and target temperature capabilities

1.0.8.en: Update app logo and brand color

1.0.9.en: Add flow - action to turn on sleep mode from today for a defined number of days
